column5: Looking for feedback on bait and lure options to use in the spring on Rainy Lake. Going Mid May. Any suggestions on Plastics, or other live bait that works well in the spring. Minnows are 4 dollars a dozen which is the base price up there but I want to limit my minnow usage at that price.Any Plastic, Worm, Leach, or salted/presealed minnows that have worked well would love the feed back.
You might be surprised what you can catch long line trolling. I've caught a lot of fish on Rapala Husky Jerks early in the spring.
